content.query:
CREATE TABLE [cleasing_data].[vtex_client] 
AS 
    SELECT  
        [orderId]
        ,[sequence]
        ,[marketplaceOrderId]
        ,[sellerOrderId]
        ,[origin]
        ,[affiliateId]
        ,[salesChannel]
        ,[merchantName]
        ,[status]
        ,[statusDescription]
        ,[value]
        ,[creationDate]
        ,[orderGroup]
        ,(
            select [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] 
            inner join [raw_data].[vtex_order] on 
            [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_order].[orderid]
            where [id] = 'Items'
        ) as "Total_Items"
        ,(
            select [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] 
            inner join [raw_data].[vtex_order] on 
            [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_order].[orderid]
            where [id] = 'Discounts'
        ) as "Total_Discount"
        ,(
            select [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] 
            inner join [raw_data].[vtex_order] on 
            [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_order].[orderid]
            where [id] = 'Shipping'
        ) as "Total_Shipping"
        ,(
            select [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[value] from [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals] 
            inner join [raw_data].[vtex_order] on 
            [raw_data].[vtex_order_totals].[orderid] = [raw_data].[vtex_order].[orderid]
            where [id] = 'Tax'
        ) as "Total_Tax"     
    FROM [raw_data].[vtex_order]
